mapper.select: SELECT to_char(pay.regdate,'yyyymmdd') "DATE", count(*) total FROM subscribes s JOIN payments pay ON pay.sub_no = s.no JOIN products p ON p.no = s.product_no where p.giver_no = #{giverNo} group by to_char(pay.regdate,'yyyymmdd')

SELECT to_char(pay.regdate,'yyyymmdd') "DATE", sum(pay.price) total FROM subscribes s JOIN payments pay ON pay.sub_no = s.no JOIN products p ON p.no = s.product_no where p.giver_no = #{giverNo} group by to_char(pay.regdate,'yyyymmdd')
SELECT sum(pay.price) total FROM subscribes s JOIN payments pay ON pay.sub_no = s.no JOIN products p ON p.no = s.product_no where p.giver_no =#{giverNo}

SELECT sum(pay.price) total FROM subscribes s JOIN payments pay ON pay.sub_no = s.no JOIN products p ON p.no = s.product_no where p.giver_no = #{giverNo} AND TO_CHAR(pay.regdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = TO_CHAR(current_date,'yyyy-mm-dd')

SELECT to_char(pay.regdate,'yyyymm') "MONTH", sum(pay.price) total FROM subscribes s JOIN payments pay ON pay.sub_no = s.no JOIN products p ON p.no = s.product_no where p.giver_no = #{giverNo} group by to_char(pay.regdate,'yyyymm')

SELECT s.product_no FROM payments p JOIN subscribes s ON p.sub_no = s.no JOIN products pr ON pr.no = s.product_no WHERE sysdate < p.regdate+7 AND pr.category_no BETWEEN 5 AND 6 GROUP BY s.product_no ORDER BY count(s.product_no) DESC
